Text: REPST I consider myself pretty fortunateI start my new job at Duke Energy tomorrow morning Ill be working on the Hourly Power Trading desk and will hopefully have a chance to move into a daytime trading structuring or origination role months from now Well see Anyway Ill keep in touch And this email will be the best place to reach me Thanks again And I hope that Enrons trading JV gets formed soon Later Reagan Bass Eric Eric NRONcom wrote No problem Thanks for playing Hopefully we can keep in touch and have the same people next year I will be settling the league up shortly and will send you a check How are things going otherwise Eric Original Message From Reagan Mathews mailto Sent Tuesday January AM To Subject End of Season Eric Thanks for running the league It was fun And thanks for selecting Boumann as your QB in the first round of the playoffs And tell PLove that I appreciated him leaving Warner for me at the th pick in the draft Anyway since I no longer work in the Enron building it would probably be easiest to drop a check in the mail Reagan Mathews Canyon Stream Ct Houston TX By my calculation the amount should be x comes frommy total costs of plus my paid amount of plus my winnings of The reason I bring this up is that it looks like the Finances page of the website is double counting the entry fee Anyway let me know if you have a different number for the distributions Reagan Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online
